content.value:
I patiently await the day when I can tell someone I don’t want kids and they don’t reply with “you may change your mind/want one later.”

Apparently you can choose to have kids when you’re young, but if you’re 30 and choose not to have kids you’re too young to make that decision.
content.html: I patiently await the day when I can tell someone I don’t want kids and they don’t reply with “you may change your mind/want one later.” Apparently you can choose to have kids when you’re young, but if you’re 30 and choose not to have kids you’re too young to make that decision.
